sentences.en: a pianist in great request.
sentences.cn: 极受欢迎的钢琴家

sentences.en: Chambermaids will bring an iron or hair dryer on request.
sentences.cn: 只要提出要求，清理房间的女服务员就会送来熨斗或电吹风。

sentences.en: France had agreed to his request for political asylum.
sentences.cn: 法国已经同意了他寻求政治庇护的请求。

sentences.en: Leaflets giving details are available on request.
sentences.cn: 备有介绍详情的传单以供索取。

sentences.en: Mendoza is here pending his request for political asylum.
sentences.cn: 门多萨在要求获得政治庇护之前一直呆在这里。

sentences.en: Price quotes on selected product categories will be sent on request.
sentences.cn: 所选产品类别的报价承索即寄。

sentences.en: References are available on request.
sentences.cn: 有参考资料备索

sentences.en: She has said nothing regarding your request.
sentences.cn: 关于你的要求，她什么也没说。

sentences.en: She left the light on in the bathroom at his request.
sentences.cn: 她按照他的要求将浴室里的灯开着。

sentences.en: She peremptorily rejected the request.
sentences.cn: 她断然拒绝了请求。

sentences.en: The army sent me a postcard acknowledging my request.
sentences.cn: 军队寄给我一张明信片告知我的申请书已收到。

sentences.en: The meeting was called in response to a request from Venezuela.
sentences.cn: 应委内瑞拉的要求召开了这次会议。

sentences.en: The request for money made them feel uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 索要金钱让他们有些不安。

sentences.en: The request is published in notices in today's national newspapers.
sentences.cn: 这一请求刊登在今天全国各大报纸的启事栏里。

sentences.en: They are likely to respond positively to the President's request for aid.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会对总统的援助要求作出积极回应。

sentences.en: They have made an urgent request for international aid.
sentences.cn: 他们紧急请求国际援助。

sentences.en: To request more information, please call our toll free number.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情，请拨打我们的免费电话。

sentences.en: Vietnam made an official request that the meeting be postponed.
sentences.cn: 越南已经正式请求将会议推迟。

sentences.en: We are offering these scarves for sale again by request.
sentences.cn: 应大众要求我们再次出售这些头巾

sentences.en: You have to request permission if you want to take any photographs.
sentences.cn: 拍照必须征得同意。

sentences.en: You will do as I request, if you please.
sentences.cn: 请按我的要求做。
